## Worm.getStates() method

Get the current states the Worm has.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getStates(session: number): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | number | The Worm session to be targeted. |

**Returns:**

string\[\]

All possible states.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1 GB
